code: import{ClientMessages,GameActionTypes}from"../../api/socket";import{wsSendMessage}from"../socket/actions";export var SET_PLAYERS="SET_PLAYERS";export var ADD_BUILT_CONNECTION="ADD_BUILT_CONNECTION";export var ADD_TICKET="ADD_TICKET";export var NEXT_PLAYER_TURN="NEXT_PLAYER_TURN";export var ADD_HISTORY="ADD_HISTORY";export var ADD_COMPLETED_TICKET="ADD_COMPLETED_TICKET";export function setPlayers(players){return{type:SET_PLAYERS,payload:players};}function addBuiltConnectionToPlayer(playerId,connectionId){return{type:ADD_BUILT_CONNECTION,payload:{playerId:playerId,connectionId:connectionId}};}export function nextPlayerTurn(currentPlayerId){return{type:NEXT_PLAYER_TURN,payload:currentPlayerId};}function addTicketToPlayer(playerId,ticket){return{type:ADD_TICKET,payload:{playerId:playerId,ticket:ticket}};}function addHistoryToPlayer(playerId,historyElement){return{type:ADD_HISTORY,payload:{playerId:playerId,historyElement:historyElement}};}function addCompletedTicketToPlayer(playerId,ticket){return{type:ADD_COMPLETED_TICKET,payload:{playerId:playerId,ticket:ticket}};}export function addBuiltConnection(playerId,connectionId){var broadcast=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:false;return function(dispatch,getState){dispatch(addBuiltConnectionToPlayer(playerId,connectionId));if(broadcast){dispatch(wsSendMessage(ClientMessages.SYNC_ACTION,[getState().game.id,{type:GameActionTypes.ADD_BUILT_CONNECTION,payload:{playerId:playerId,connectionId:connectionId}},true],function(){}));}};}export function addTicket(playerId,ticket){var broadcast=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:false;return function(dispatch,getState){dispatch(addTicketToPlayer(playerId,ticket));if(broadcast){dispatch(wsSendMessage(ClientMessages.SYNC_ACTION,[getState().game.id,{type:GameActionTypes.ADD_TICKET,payload:{playerId:playerId,ticket:ticket}},true],function(){}));}};}export function addHistory(playerId,historyElement){var broadcast=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:false;return function(dispatch,getState){dispatch(addHistoryToPlayer(playerId,historyElement));if(broadcast){dispatch(wsSendMessage(ClientMessages.SYNC_ACTION,[getState().game.id,{type:GameActionTypes.ADD_HISTORY,payload:{playerId:playerId,historyElement:historyElement}},true],function(){}));}};}export function addCompletedTicket(playerId,ticket){var broadcast=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:false;return function(dispatch,getState){dispatch(addCompletedTicketToPlayer(playerId,ticket));if(broadcast){dispatch(wsSendMessage(ClientMessages.SYNC_ACTION,[getState().game.id,{type:GameActionTypes.ADD_COMPLETED_TICKET,payload:{playerId:playerId,ticket:ticket}},true],function(){}));}};}
